mapper.select: SELECT l.local_auth_id, l.username, l.password, l.create_time, l.update_time, p.user_id, p.user_name, p.gender, p.email, p.profile_img, p.user_type, p.create_time, p.update_time, p.enable_status FROM tb_local_auth l LEFT JOIN tb_user p ON l.user_id = p.user_id WHERE l.username = #{username} AND l.password = #{password}

SELECT l.local_auth_id, l.username, l.password, l.create_time, l.update_time, p.user_id, p.user_name, p.gender, p.email, p.profile_img, p.user_type, p.create_time, p.update_time, p.enable_status FROM tb_local_auth l LEFT JOIN tb_user p ON l.user_id = p.user_id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_local_auth( username, password, user_id, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{userInfo.userId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
